row.name: PCK.AUTOMIC_ATLASSIAN_JIRA.PUB.INCLUDE.LOAD_PCK_PARAMETERS
row.description: Load the package parameters from VARA object

row.Docu: This include is used to load two paramaters manily connection time out and read time out form the VARA PCK.AUTOMIC_ATLASSIAN_JIRA.PRV.VARA.PACKAGE_PARAMETERS and set the values into two paramters UC4RB_JIRA_CONNECTION_TIMEOUT and UC4RB_JIRA_READ_TIMEOUT It can be used for both Windows and Unix environment
